summary: This tag explores transformative innovation aimed at rejuvenating our planet and communities through decentralized systems and regenerative design. It emphasizes moving beyond sustainability to adopt approaches that foster collaboration, adaptability, and resilience. By focusing on ecosystem architecture, it seeks to create interconnected communities capable of addressing complex challenges sustainably.
excerpt: Practice Innovation envisions a future where decentralized systems and regenerative design rejuvenate both our environment and communities. This transformative approach focuses on collaboration, adaptability, and resilience.
